item.description:
IM is kicking off a newly brewed series of fun Sunday afternoon discussions on creativity, self-improvement, relationships, the arts, and a few surprises.

 

For our first discussion, a bunch of IM regulars thought it would be fun to discuss and share the best and worst of our dating experiences.  What is the most romantic date you've been on?   What is the best date idea you've come up with?  What was your most surprising or unusual date you've been on?

 

What are some of the worst blind dates you've experienced?

 

Come join friends to discuss those experiences you remember fondly, or can now much later actually laugh at.

 

We do love our coffee.  So we'll be trying a new coffee house in Central Sq.   They have coffee, expressos, tea, hot chocolates, etc.

 

The event will be from 1PM to 3PM.

 

Location:

Andala Coffee House

286 Franklin Street

Cambridge‎ MA

United States

(just 1 block from Central Sq.)
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us on the main floor, near the entrance.
item.name: Carpe Caffeine: Blind Dates
